Subject: DrillBit Retreats/Hot Rod And A Old Friend
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
From: RoboRick007 <rfa007@...>

::DrillBit::

He hears the attacks from behind.
"Beast mode!" He says, transforming, and drilling under ground.
The shots struck the surface behind him. He moved on a zig zag rout to
the new base location.

::Hot Rod::

"Hot Rod, maximize." 
He transformed, and shook Magnus' hand.
"I'm doing fine. I went along with the great upgrade, and became a
Maximal. I've been alive since."
He appeared very happy. It wasn't an act. He was over joyed to see
Magnus. He forgot that they were most likely on opposite sides now.

He motioned to Feline.
"I'd like you to meet someone. This is Feline, my..."
He really didn't know what to say. What were they now.
"My girl friend," he said, winking at her.
